cause.description:
Support our troops of yesterday and today and of all wars. Show your support for the people that give you all the freedoms that you enjoy every day.
A non-profit organization titled Write Our Troops is helping by sending your letters to the troops overseas, for more details and information as to how you can personally support our troops please visit the following link. join the group for details and pictures of our troops serving our country!
groups.yahoo.com/group/writeourtroops
1. Support the troops.
cause.mission: support all our troops over seas or home
cause.name: Support Our Troops (USA)
